title: Cookies on allowed websites
content:
Hi there, I have configured Firefox to remove cookies after closing it. At the same time, I have added some webs that I usually use as exceptions, allowing to remember cookies in those. However, I have the following question: if I reject all cookies except for the mandatories ones in a website that I added to my "remember list", does that mean that future entrances in that web will be with only essential cookies?

As an example, if I mark https://www.bbc.com/ as cookies, and the first time I enter I reject all non-essential cookies, next times I enter in the bbc will I be navigating with only the cookies I accepted on this first entrance? Or allowing a site automatically accepts all cookies?

Thank you very much on advanced.
creator: rdemedrano

title: Error while Online-Streaming

title: pocket ne s'ouvre pas correctement
content:
Bonjour , quand j’essaie de consulter ma liste Pocket la liste s'ouvre et disparait aussitôt que j’essaie de faire défiler l'historique. Et j'ai le message suivant  :"Oups. Quelque chose s'est mal passé...

Il y a eu une erreur. Essayez de rafraîchir votre page et de voir si cela répare les choses. Si vous êtes encore en train de voir le problème, veuillez contacter notre équipe de soutien. Appui à la prise en charge" j'ai redémarrer sans succés. Pouvez vous m'aider? Merci d'avance
creator: jacoucroquant

title: Video stream stutters following recent Firefox update
content:
Hi there

I have been getting stuttering on a particular stream. everthing else plays OK. This started mid Septemberish, but went away after early October Firefox update. However most recent update on 25thOctober has reintroduced the stutter. As an example https://bw101.attheraces.com/ps/player/default.aspx - plays fine https://wab-visualisation.performgroup.com/csb/index.html - stutters The ons and offs all coinside with recent Firefox updates. Does anyone have any thoughts about the element within the updates that might be causing this issue?
creator: fred.lancaster

title: I can't use streaming services like Netflix and HBO
content: Last week my laptop broke down and I needed to reinstall Windows. Since my laptop is old, it can only support Windows 7 and since I installed it, I can't use Netflix nor other streaming services. On Netflix's page it says I don't have the latest version installed and I did all I was suggested to do and all solutions that was offered by Netflix is in order (browser history is on, I have the latest version of Firefox, I restarted and reinstalled my browser, DRM content is on, Firefox content plugins are up to date and I'm using official version of Firefox). Don't know what else I can do, except to change the browser which I really don't want to but if nothing else will work... Please help. Thanks, Danijela
creator: danijela40

title: JPEG Images no longer open internally in FF, get downloaded. No option to open internally
content:
Suddenly, now on FF 119.0.0.1, JPEG Images no longer open in new tab when clicked with mid-mouse-button (previous behaviour, wanted), instead they get downloaded, safed to DL-folder, and maybe opened in 3rd-party-app. I tried to change the Open-with settings, but to no avail - there's no option to 'Open in Firefox'/Internally. (Only Open with../Download)

I've tried older guides on the topic, which didn't apply here it seems, also cleaned cache, etc.
creator: fronten

title: FIle-picker window on one of my machines is much larger than my display
content:
The file-picker (when I choose any file related operation such as Open File, Save As, etc) on just one of my machines is far larger than my desktop size (and the window appears not to be resizable).

When I trigger any such operation I'm presented with what looks like a blank screen as I a shown part of the vast unused area of this oversized window. If I force my wm to allow me to move the window I can use the file picker with a lot of painful repeated scrolling around but otherwise it's unusable.

Any idea why firefox might be doing this or where it might have cached the file picker size? There doesn't appear to be anything related in about:config or userprefs.js

Starting up in trubleshooting mode doesn't have any effect on this.
creator: fledermaus

title: Problem with selling pages on Ebay UK
content: Have sold loads on Ebay using only Firefox as the browser. Tried to list another item a few days ago, and after entering the details on the first page (Item description and section to list it in) couldn't get beyond that page. The next page appeared not blank but as light grey filled rectangles where the text etc should be. Obviously tried reload. Same over the next day or so. In desperation, used Edge. No problems with that, using the same first page which Ebay had stored for me. Just tried again with Firefox - same fault.
creator: dave271

title: Can we use fonts from Google Fonts in Canva?
content:
Yes, you can upload Google Fonts to Canva. However, you will need to take a few steps first. Make sure the font you want is available on Google Fonts, then download the file and save it to your computer. Finally, upload the file to Canva.

Fonts Monster
creator: connertaylaar

title: Which text font looks good in AutoCAD drawing?
content:
The most common fonts in technical drawing are Arial, Tahoma, simplex, roman, ISOCP, ISOCPEUR, Comic Sans ect. You can use anu font as per your taste and the result will be pefect as far as you use the same font all over the drawing.

Anchor Fonts

title: Microphone not working in Firefox
content:
Hi all, I can not get Firefox to use my Microphone,

  • Works in other apps directly on Windows
  • Works in other browsers, Edge
  • Works in Windows

I have

  • Refreshed Firefox
  • Uninstalled Firefox, removed folders in %appdata% https://assets-prod.sumo.prod.webservices.mozgcp.net/media/uploads/images/2023-11-11-23-20-58-0773b4.png
  • Updated windows to latest buildhttps://assets-prod.sumo.prod.webservices.mozgcp.net/media/uploads/images/2023-11-11-23-20-44-96d242.png
  • made sure all Windows 11 permissions were correct https://assets-prod.sumo.prod.webservices.mozgcp.net/media/uploads/images/2023-11-11-23-20-49-4817cf.png
  • Made sure Firefox is using my only Microphone,

https://assets-prod.sumo.prod.webservices.mozgcp.net/media/uploads/images/2023-11-11-23-20-54-d5c3a4.png
creator: Morrosis

title: YouTube
content: Ad blockers violate YouTube's Terms of Service It looks like you may be using an ad blocker. Video playback is blocked unless YouTube is allowlisted or the ad blocker is disabled. Ads allow YouTube to be used by billions worldwide. You can go ad-free with YouTube Premium and creators can still get paid from your subscription
creator: sourabsharma8684

title: Synching Issue
content:
My question may be a Google question but I have yet to locate a simple answer but it might be a FF issue.

I just updated my Gmail Contacts on my Win 10 laptop. My Android is listed as a known device on Google. After I updated my contacts Google automatically synchs the changes/updates to my Android Galaxy S8 phone. I checked my phone and no updates. I tried synching from my phone but no changes.

My issue isfor the life of me I cannot find EXACTLY where the command option is located for synching contacts in Google. I went "Accounts" management, on the left there are many options.I drilled down and I cannot find 'synching.' I found my device but nothing around there is there an option for synching. I thought as a last resort it might be a FF matter but so far it doesn't seem to be.

So where oh where PLEEEASE PRECISELY, EXACTLY in Google is the synching command option if you can tell me. Thanks for your help.
creator: StevenLAX16

title: History Only Shows Today's History
content:
I am having this issue where Firefox only keeps "Today's" history. I have thoroughly looked at the community's similar issue fixes.

I do not have Private Browsing on. I have set "Custom Settings History: 

 -Remember browsing and download history  -Remember search and form history

I do not have CC Cleaner or like apps and the one I do is on auto-manual and does not clear FF.

There is no reason for this. I would like to know when answering, what are a couple of likely causes for this. It appears by many queries here and on Google this has been an issue for years and FF seems not to want to fix it or know about it. Your help is appreciated.
creator: StevenLAX16
